replies.body:
Given the screenshot, I'd say wait to let it finish the self-update before it launches in the login screen. If you still see this after waiting for a while, follow the steps below:

> * Delete your *\RADS\solutions\league_client_sln* folder if one exists in your League install
* Delete all but your "installer" folder in *\RADS\projects\league_client\releases* directory
* Run *\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClient.exe*

Let me know if this helped. ^.^
Thanks a lot bud. I didn't see this response until now sadly. I simply went into the Riot folders and clicked on the old Launcher and it did just fine. Thanks a lot though.
Followed instructions, was immediately fixed. Thank you!
